member.name: T:Tasty.Build.Extensions
member.summary: extension methods.

member.name: M:Tasty.Build.Extensions.SplitConnectionString(System.String)
member.summary: Splits a database connection string into a collection of key/value pairs. The resulting keys are all normalized to lower-case.
member.param: The connection string to split.
member.returns: The connection string as a collection of key/value pairs.

member.name: M:Tasty.Build.Extensions.SplitSqlCommands(System.String)
member.summary: Splits a string of SQL commands on "GO" to enable issuing them individually using ADO.
member.param: The SQL command set to split.

member.name: M:Tasty.Build.Extensions.ToConnectionString(System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Gets the given collection as a database connection string (key/values paired with '=' and separated by ';').
member.param: The connection string collection to convert.

member.name: T:Tasty.Build.IS3PublisherDelegate
member.summary: Delegate for notifications during an publish process.

member.name: M:Tasty.Build.IS3PublisherDelegate.OnFilePublished(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Called when a file has been successfully published to Amazon S3.
member.param: The path of the file that was published.
The resulting object key of the file on Amazon S3.
A value indicating whether the file was compressed with GZip before publishing.

member.name: T:Tasty.Build.ISchemaUpgradeDelegate
member.summary: Delegate for providing meta-data information about a database being upgraded with a process.

member.name: M:Tasty.Build.ISchemaUpgradeDelegate.GetCommandSet(System.Version)
member.summary: Gets a string of SQL commands that represent a single step in the upgrade process. The SQL should represent the upgrade to the given version from the version immediately preceding it.
member.param: The version to get the upgrade commands for.

member.name: M:Tasty.Build.ISchemaUpgradeDelegate.GetCurrentVersion
member.summary: Gets the current version the target database is at.

member.name: M:Tasty.Build.ISchemaUpgradeDelegate.GetTargetVersion
member.summary: Gets the version to upgrade the target database to.

member.name: M:Tasty.Build.ISchemaUpgradeDelegate.GetUpgradePath(System.Version,System.Version)
member.summary: Gets a collection of individual version steps that represent the path for upgrading the target database from one version to another.
member.param: The version the database is being upgraded from.
The version the database is being upgraded to.

member.name: M:Tasty.Build.ISchemaUpgradeDelegate.MarkAsUpgraded(System.Version)
member.summary: Marks the target database as successfully upgraded for the given version. This method is called after each discreet upgrade step is performed successfully.
member.param: The version to mark the database for.

member.name: T:Tasty.Build.S3Publisher

member.name: M:Tasty.Build.SchemaUpgradeService.GenerateInstallScript(System.Version,System.Version,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a SQL installation script by searching the given directory for SQL script files with names that correspond to version numbers and concatenating them together into a file created at the given output path.
member.param: The lower-bound version number to restrict the resulting script to (exclusive).
The upper-bound version number to restrict the resulting script to (inclusive).
The directory to search for scripts within (the search with be recursive).
The path of the output file to create or overwrite.

The upper-bound version number to restrict the resulting script to (inclusive).
The directory to search for scripts within (the search with be recursive).
The path of the output file to create or overwrite.
A function that should be called for each script that is found and added to the output.

member.name: P:Tasty.Configuration.JobsElement.Heartbeat
member.summary: Gets or sets the heartbeat timeout (in miliseconds) to use for the job runner. The runner will pause for this duration at the end of each cancel/finish/timeout/dequeue loop. When not configured, defaults to 10,000 (10 seconds).

member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of jobs that are allowed to be running simultaneously. When not configured, defaults to 10.

member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of retries to perform when a job fails or is timed out. When not configured, defaults to 0 (no retries).

member.name: P:Tasty.Jobs.JobStore.Current
member.summary: Gets or sets the current implementation in use. The setter on this property is primarily meant for testing purposes.
member.remarks: It is not recommended to set this property during runtime. You should instead set it during static initialization if you would rather not infer it from the configuration. Setting it later could cause persistence errors if any currently-executing jobs try to persist their update data to the new store.
